column1: English Sent: In due course of time this depression
column2: gradually got filled with deposition of sediments by the rivers flowing from the mountains in the north and the peninsular plateau in the south.

column1: Hindi Tansl: samaya ke sAWa-sAWa yaha besina uwwara ke parvawoM evaM xakRiNa ke prAyaxvIpIya paTAroM se bahane vAlI naxiyoM ke avasAxI nikRepoM xvArA XIre-XIre Bara gayA.
Anu Translation:  isa samaya kA yaWAvaXi uxAsI XIre XIre uwwara meM parvawa Ora xakRiNa meM prAyaxvIpIya paTAra se bahawA huA naxiyoM se walaCatoM ke nikRepaNa se pUrA kI gayI
